metadata.title: CVE-2017-8932 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A bug in the standard library ScalarMult implementation of curve P-256 foramd64 architectures in Go before 1.7.6 and 1.8.x before 1.8.2 causesincorrect results to be generated for specific input points. An adaptiveattack can be mounted to progressively extract the scalar input toScalarMult by submitting crafted points and observing failures to thederive correct output. This leads to a full key recovery attack againststatic ECDH, as used in popular JWT libraries.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
